titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to Orange County, California, for intercounty express bus service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/6/2003--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make discretionary grants to Orange County, California, for the purchase of 46 buses and related equipment for intercounty express bus service for specified routes.
